Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Get deals and shopping advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the experts at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top Amazon deals today, including a waterproof portable speaker, one of our favorite headphones and a variety of shaving products, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. If you're looking for N95 and KN95 masks right now, Amazon also has plenty of choices on sale today, too.

► Presidents' Day:  Shop the best deals on mattresses, furniture and everything in between

► Valentine's Day deals:  Free Taco Bell, Starbucks delivery discount, heart-shaped pizza and more

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

Better still, right now, shoppers can receive a $5 discount on their first $10-or-more Amazon app purchase. 

The best Amazon deals of the day

1. Up to 36% off: These smooth shaving essentials

Stay smooth with select Gillette and Venus shaving tools on sale at Amazon today. You can get a package of 10 Fusion5 razor cartridges and 2 ProGlide razor cartridges together for $27.99—30% off the list price of $39.99. Gillette says both cartridge types feature a lubrication strip and anti-friction blades for a close shave. You can get even more precision with the Gillette Venus Intimate Grooming electric razor for women, typically listed for $29.99 but now available at 30% off at $20.96. The brand says the device works in and out of the shower and features lateral skin protection fins for gentle removal of hair. 

Save up to 36% on select Gillette and Venus shaving essentials

2. Save $20: This waterproof portable speaker 

Blast your favorite songs at any house party or outdoor adventure with the Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 speaker available for $129.99. Normally priced at $149.99, you can get this cylindrical portable speaker for 13% off in four different colors. The brand says the BOOM 3 not only has a water and dustproof design, but it even floats and can totally be submerged in water for up to 30 minutes. The BOOM 3 also offers up to 15 hours of playtime in a single charge and has what the brand dubs a "Magic Button" on its top to let you play, pause and skip songs with one touch.

Get the Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 Portable Waterproof Speaker for $129.99 (Save $20)

3. Less than $175: One of our favorite headphones

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for under $180 right now. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $174.98—a $74.02 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $174.98 (Save $74.02)

4. 22% off: These delicious coffee pods

Keep the fresh brews coming by signing up for a Subscribe and Save membership for Starbucks Blonde Roast Veranda Blend K-Cup coffee pods. Typically priced at $32.48, you can get a 60-count box of these coffee Keurig-compatible coffee pods with Amazon's delivery membership for 22% off at $25.32—that's about 42 cents per pod! With Subscribe and Save, you can get 5% off the delivery of your first order and up to 15% off repeat deliveries that you can schedule from every two weeks to every six months. Starbucks says the Veranda blend is its lightest roasted blend with notes of toasted malt and baking chocolate in each brew. 

Get the Starbucks Blonde Roast Veranda Blend K-Cup Coffee Pods for $25.32 (Save $7.16)

5. Up to 40%: These compact charging accessories

Keep your portable electronics charged with these select Anker charging accessories on sale at Amazon today. There's the brand's 30-watt USB-C wall charger normally priced at $29.99, but now selling for 31% off at $20.79. Anker says this power outlet is not only compatible with most Apple, Google and Samsung smartphones, but also iPad tablets and MacBook laptops—and it does it all in a package the size of a golf ball. Pair it with the Anker Powerline II lightning cable three-pack, on sale for $19.99 thanks to a 33% discount. The brand says its cables can withstand more than 12,000 bends during tests, promising durability no matter how many times you shove it in your backpack.

Save up to 40% on select Anker charging accessories

The best Amazon deals from this week

1. Bissell Power Fresh Steam Mop

Get a head start on spring cleaning by picking up the Bissell Power Fresh steam mop, down from $92.69 to $82.69 right now at Amazon. Ranking as one of our favorite steam mops, this powerful cleaning tool has three SmartSet power settings and a convenient 23-foot power cord. Better still, the mop can be ready to use in just 30 seconds and comes with several scrubbing pads so you can easily and quickly rid your floors of dirt and grime. Designed to leave your hardwoods and tiles sparkling, the brand claims this steam mop eliminates as much as 99.9% of germs and bacteria. 

Get the Bissell Power Fresh Steam Mop for $82.69 (Save $10)

2. Amazon Kindle Paperwhite

The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite is our favorite Kindle and one of the best e-readers we've ever tested. Right now, you can pick up the 6.8-inch device and dive into all your favorite books for just $109.99 for the 8GB 11th Generation version—$30 off the full $139.99 list price and one of the lowest prices we've ever seen. With the Paperwhite, you can read thousands of titles, catch up on podcasts and even listen to audiobooks when you connect a Bluetooth audio device. In testing, we found the device had a large, crisp display and an impressive battery life—it's capable of running for up to 10 weeks on a single charge. 

Get the Amazon 8GB Kindle Paperwhite for $109.99 (Save $30)

3. MySmile Powerful Cordless Water Dental Flosser

Keeping your teeth sparkly clean is easy with the MySmile powerful cordless water dental flosser, down from $83.99 to as little as $47.59 for the white version. Ranking as one of our favorite oral irrigators, this water flosser features a 350-milliliter reservoir, a rotating nozzle and five cleaning modes to remove food residue and stains between your teeth. According to the brand, the dental device has a battery life of up to 20 days, making it convenient for travel, too. 

Get the MySmile Powerful Cordless Water Dental Flosser from $47.59 (Save $33 to $36.40)

4. Hertzko Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats

Keep your pet's fur silky smooth with the Hertzko self-cleaning slicker brush, down from $29.99 to just $14.99 right now—a whopping 50% price cut. An Amazon customer-favorite, this brush can be used on both dogs and cats to gently remove matted fur, tangles and dander. Made with retractable bristles for easy cleaning, the best-selling brush is designed to groom your pet's undercoat without scratching or irritating their skin.

Get the Hertzko Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats for $14.99 (Save $15.29)

5. Amazon Fire Stick 4K

If you're a big Alexa user (or an Amazon Prime Video watcher!) looking to treat yourself to some evening binge-watching, we have the device for you: The Fire Stick 4K, which is on sale for $29.99—that's $20 off its typical list price of $49.99. The Fire Stick 4K is one of our favorite streaming devices for its excellent remote with intuitive controls for the TV and all Alexa-controlled devices. It also supports major streaming services including Disney+ and HBO Max. 

Get the Amazon Fire Stick 4K for $29.99 (Save $20)
